comments.author: @espy8298
comments.text: Dude, I honestly fucking love watching people get huge donations on Twitch. It's awesome seeing someone's face light up because they're getting awarded for something they've worked really hard for. When I got 10+ likes on my video yesterday with 70 subs, I couldn't even sleep because of how excited I was. Even if it's not donating a couple thousand dollars or liking some kids video on YouTube, you should pay it forward somehow today. Make somebody's day better.
